issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Introduce the ability to change the background color of an Android MenuItem programmatically via the Titanium API.
fields.summary: Ability to change background color of MenuItems

comments.body: The Android API does not expose this capability natively. There is nothing we can expose to allow you to do this. Also, doing a survey of several Android apps, I didn't find any that overrode the system theme for menus.
